title: Ethereum Cat Herder Meeting #61
body:
## Date and Time

June 22, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. [ECH website](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/155) 
- Update

### 2. Blogs & survey
- EF's [London Testnets Announcement blog](https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/06/18/london-testnets-announcement/)
- [London overview blog](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/london-upgrade-overview-8eccb0041b41)
- [Ethereum blockchain users and developers research](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeugRHv93fizew0zeqXFOOnQIbjbWnVHoThLJR3f3g6gVvXhQ/viewform)

### 3. ECH new initiatives
- Stateless meetings playlist
- Community partners at hackathon/events
- Addition of new Discord channels at "Discontinued products/clients", "Hackathon"

### 4. [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F) 
- [EIP- 3541 with Alex Beregszaszi, Paweł Bylica, Andrei Maiboroda](https://youtu.be/E02THhW-yTE).
- [EIP-1559 with Tim Beiko, Barnabé Monnot, Micah Zoltu](https://youtu.be/AC1FS3LmoT4).

Upcoming
- Altair client implementation (Teku) with Adrain Sutton on June 22 at 4:00 pm EST
- Difficulty bomb with James Hancock on June 29 at 2:30 pm EST
- Follow more on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

### 5. Events & meetup
- [EthCC [4]](https://ethcc.io/) 

### 6. ECH funding
- Funding via ESP & Moloch

### 7. [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
- Merge implementers' meeting 6
- All Core Dev meeting [#115](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/All%20Core%20Devs%20Meetings/Meeting%20115.md) 
- Eth2 Implementers' meeting 66
- EIP Improvement Process meeting 35

### 8. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 9. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 60](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20060.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - July 06, 2021
